file_content.text: Our prisoner ought to fetch a hefty ransom.
I did my part. You have the prisoner?
Padrus? Of course. We extracted him easily enough.
What do you mean, "we"? I'm the one who had to carry that whiny brat.
Nice work drawing those guards away. Allowed us to get in and out without a fuss.
Padrus had some spending money on him. Figured you earned any spoils.
You get the guards' attention. We'll handle the rest.
Face it, Tegan. Lieutenant Grol gave me more commendations than anyone in this unit. He clearly would've wanted me in charge.
I was running ops with the lieutenant while you were still polishing boots at the Academy, boy. Now shut it. We've got company.
Sorry for the fuss, my lord. Sergeant Tegan, Bravo Team.
Sorry about the fuss, sir. Sergeant Tegan, Bravo Team.
Sorry about that. Sergeant Tegan, Bravo Team.
Sergeant Pratt, Alpha Team. We just lost our CO and half our unit trying to raid the Alde estate.
Then put your squabbling aside and remember who it is you serve.
Quit bickering.
Yes, my lord. Pratt?
You will answer to me now.
Kneel before me.
As you say, my lord. Beats taking orders from Brat, here.
It's Pratt.
I might be willing to help you out, provided someone can foot the bill.
Did your CO leave any creds?
Appreciate it, but you might not be so generous once you hear what we're up against. Pratt?
If your lieutenant neglected to appoint an XO, the Empire is better off without him.
Your CO was incompetent.
Grol served thirteen years without a scratch. Thought he was invincible.
No CO?
Definitely not Junior, here.
Can we just get back to the mission?
You attacked House Alde? Why?
What were you doing?
We're after some fancy-pants nobleman. Pratt here has the details.
Our target is Padrus Organa. Rumor is he's being groomed as House Organa's next heir. His ransom could finance our campaign for a year.
Security's tight, but we might be able to nab the little bugger if you can distract the guards.
Distract them how?
I can handle it.
The compound is crawling with Organa and Alde sentries. Hit the alarm and they'll come running.
You just need to hold them off long enough for us to secure Padrus and make our escape. We'll let you know when we're clear.
No way. [Refuse quest]
Can't blame you.
Hey, Pratt. You're loud and distracting. How'd you like a special assignment?
For the last time, Pratt, I don't take orders from you.
We've taken Padrus, so feel free to pull back. We'll meet you at--ow! He bit me!
That did it. Got every guard in the compound headed your way. Good luck.
